timeline.bodyHTML:
Please remove the trailing space or the check will fail.

Suggested change
// MSG 0x00000065 0x0e414e47 f 0x00000001 0xbc2fbb5f 0x00000062
// MSG 0x00000065 0x0e414e47 f 0x00000001 0xbc2fbb5f 0x00000062
